project_descr: Peace Through Justice Programme - a joint programme between UNAMA, UNDP, UNICEF, UNIFEM, and UNODC strengthening supply and demand for access to justice both for men and women at the district level across Afghanistan

outputs.output_descr:
Activity1 Greater awareness of community members from constitutional and human rights
Activity2 Community representatives and leaders have improved knowledge of human rights and skills to manage disputes
Activity3 Government officials, institutions and CSOs demonstrate greater capacity to respond to victims of violence with a focus on children and women
Activity4 District level formal justice sector actors have increased capacity to uphold legal rights
Activity5 Physical infrastructure conditions of justice sector institutions at the local level are improved taking into account gender needs.
Activity6 	Project Management

document_name: Outcome 2 Evaluation: The democratic state and government institutions strengthened at national and sub-national levels to govern and ensure the delivery of quality public services including security with special attention to marginalized groups
